cards.title: Twenty One Pilots
cards.text: Twenty One Pilots is the band's debut album, released independently in 2009. It includes songs like "Implicit Demand for Proof" and "Johnny Boy".

cards.title: Regional at Best
cards.text: Regional at Best is the band's second independent album, released in 2011. Many of the songs from this album were reworked for the album Vessel.

cards.title: Vessel
cards.text: Vessel is the band's third studio album, released in 2013. It includes hits like "Holding on to You" and "Car Radio".

cards.title: Blurryface
cards.text: Blurryface is the fourth studio album, released in 2015. This album brought major hits like "Stressed Out" and "Ride".

cards.title: Trench
cards.text: Trench is the fifth studio album, released in 2018. It includes singles like "Jumpsuit" and "My Blood", exploring themes of identity and resistance.

cards.title: Scaled and Icy
cards.text: Scaled and Icy is the sixth studio album, released in 2021. The album was created during the pandemic and includes songs like "Shy Away" and "Choker".

cards.title: Blurryface Live
cards.text: Blurryface Live is the live album released in 2016, capturing the energy of the band's live shows during the Blurryface tour.
